_comment: This is only a comment, it has no effect on the functions of the code!
I explain here how exactly you can add your own language here, in itself it is super easy.
First you have to see what the abbreviation of your language is.
For example, for English it is 'en', for German 'de', etc.
When you have found the abbreviation, change the value of 'language' (the tag below this comment) to the abbreviation.
If you have any questions, feel free to write me on Discord: Fido_de02#9227
